metadata.title: CVE-2020-35730 on Ubuntu 20.04 LTS (focal) - medium
metadata.description:
An XSS issue was discovered in Roundcube Webmail before 1.2.13, 1.3.xbefore 1.3.16, and 1.4.x before 1.4.10. The attacker can send a plain texte-mail message, with JavaScript in a link reference element that ismishandled by linkref_addindex in rcube_string_replacer.php.

    Update Instructions:

    Run `sudo pro fix CVE-2020-35730` to fix the vulnerability. The problem can be corrected
    by updating your system to the following package versions:

roundcube - 1.4.3+dfsg.1-1ubuntu0.1~esm2
roundcube-core - 1.4.3+dfsg.1-1ubuntu0.1~esm2
roundcube-mysql - 1.4.3+dfsg.1-1ubuntu0.1~esm2
roundcube-pgsql - 1.4.3+dfsg.1-1ubuntu0.1~esm2
roundcube-plugins - 1.4.3+dfsg.1-1ubuntu0.1~esm2
roundcube-sqlite3 - 1.4.3+dfsg.1-1ubuntu0.1~esm2
Available with Ubuntu Pro: https://ubuntu.com/pro

criterions.comment: roundcube package in focal was vulnerable but has been fixed (note: '1.4.3+dfsg.1-1ubuntu0.1~esm2').
